text: The National Association of Heavy Equipment Training Schools (NAHETS) founded 2005, is an association of heavy equipment operator training schools in the United States. Mission Statement: Through curriculum development and operational oversight, NAHETS oversees member schools in training and preparing individual careers in heavy equipment and crane operations through member support, institutional standards, and industry relations. ==References== * No license required Las Vegas Business Press 2006. * Construction Schools Train Future Industry Operators Lift and Access Magazine 2007. ==External links== * National Heavy Equipment Operator School, Green Cove Springs, Florida * Heavy Construction Academy, Brentwood, New Hampshire Category:Organizations established in 2006 Category:Organizations based in Nevada
title: National Association of Heavy Equipment Training Schools
